multiplayermenu.hostserverdescription:
You can host a server by opening the following file through a file explorer:
Go to the game properties in steam and click 'browse local files'. Open 'colonyserver.exe' to host a server.

archery.description: Unlocks bow guards and production of bows at the workbench
archery.name: Archery

bannerradius1.description: Increases the safe radius created to 40 blocks
bannerradius1.name: Banner Radius I

bannerradius2.description: Increases the safe radius created to 55 blocks
bannerradius2.name: Banner Radius II

bannerradius3.description: Increases the safe radius created to 70 blocks
bannerradius3.name: Banner Radius III

bannerradius4.description: Increases the safe radius created to 85 blocks
bannerradius4.name: Banner Radius IV

bannerradius5.description: Increases the safe radius created to 100 blocks
bannerradius5.name: Banner Radius V

bloomery.description: Unlock the Bloomery, which can process iron ore & galena ore
bloomery.name: Bloomery

bronzeanvil.description: Unlock the Bronze Anvil, which can process bronze
bronzeanvil.name: Bronze Anvil

bronzeminting.description: Unlocks mints and shops. Can be used to buy seeds, dirt and other miscellaneous items
bronzeminting.name: Mints & Shops

constructionbuilder.description: Unlock builder areas for the construction worker
constructionbuilder.name: Builder

constructionbuildersize1.description: Increases maximum builder area size to 25.000
constructionbuildersize1.name: Builder Limit I

constructionbuildersize2.description: Increases maximum builder area size to 100.000
constructionbuildersize2.name: Builder Limit II

constructionbuildersize3.description: Increases maximum builder area size to 250.000
constructionbuildersize3.name: Builder Limit III

constructionbuildersize4.description: Increases maximum builder area size to 500.000
constructionbuildersize4.name: Builder Limit IV

constructionbuildersize5.description: Increases maximum builder area size to 1.000.000
constructionbuildersize5.name: Builder Limit V

constructiondigger.description: Unlock digger areas for the construction worker
constructiondigger.name: Digger

constructiondiggersize1.description: Inceases maximum digger area size to 25.000
constructiondiggersize1.name: Digger Limit I

constructiondiggersize2.description: Increases maximum digger area size to 100.000
constructiondiggersize2.name: Digger Limit II

constructiondiggersize3.description: Increases maximum digger area size to 250.000
constructiondiggersize3.name: Digger Limit III

constructiondiggersize4.description: Increases maximum digger area size to 500.000
constructiondiggersize4.name: Digger Limit IV

constructiondiggersize5.description: Increases maximum digger area size to 1.000.000
constructiondiggersize5.name: Digger Limit V

crossbow.description: Unlocks the Crossbow, a more powerful weapon than the bow
crossbow.name: Crossbow

dyertable.description: Unlocks the dyer, who can use herbs to paint certain blocks and lanterns
dyertable.name: Dyer's Table

fineryforge.description: Unlocks the Finery Forge, which uses cokes to create steel and gold ingots
fineryforge.name: Finery Forge

flaxfarming.description: Unlocks flax farmers, required to produce linen. Grants 100 flax seeds.
flaxfarming.name: Flax Farming

gunsmithshop.description: Unlocks the Gunsmith, who processes gunpowder and creates guns
gunsmithshop.name: Gunsmith Shop

healthregensize1.description: Increases regenerated amount of HP from 30 to 50
healthregensize1.name: Regeneration Increase I

healthregensize2.description: Increases regenerated amount of HP from 50 to 65
healthregensize2.name: Regeneration Increase II

healthregensize3.description: Increases regenerated amount of HP from 65 to 85
healthregensize3.name: Regeneration Increase III

healthregensize4.description: Increases regenerated amount of HP from 85 to 100
healthregensize4.name: Regeneration Increase IV

healthregenspeed1.description: Increases regeneration speed from 0.5 HP/s to 1 HP/s
healthregenspeed1.name: Regeneration Speed I

healthregenspeed2.description: Increases regeneration speed from 1 HP/s to 2 HP/s
healthregenspeed2.name: Regeneration Speed II

healthregenspeed3.description: Increases regeneration speed from 2 HP/s to 3 HP/s
healthregenspeed3.name: Regeneration Speed III

healthregenspeed4.description: Increases regeneration speed from 3 HP/s to 4 HP/s
healthregenspeed4.name: Regeneration Speed IV

herbfarming.description: Unlocks three different herb farmers. The herbs can be used by the dyer
herbfarming.name: Herb Farming

kiln.description: Unlocks kilns. Required to create advanced fuels like charcoal.
kiln.name: Kiln

lantern.description: Unlocks the production of lanterns at the anvil and the production of colored lanterns by the dyer
lantern.name: Lanterns

matchlockgun.description: Unlocks the Matchlock Gun, an early type of gun
matchlockgun.name: Matchlock Gun

quarterblockdyer.description: Unlocks the production of dyed quarterblocks by the dyer, can be used to build stairs
quarterblockdyer.name: Dyed Quarter Blocks

quarterblocksplittingstump.description: Unlocks the productions of wood colored quarterblocks at the splitting stump, can be used to build stairs
quarterblocksplittingstump.name: Wooden Quarter Blocks

quarterblockstonemason.description: Unlocks the production of grey quarterblocks by the stonemason, can be used to build stairs
quarterblockstonemason.name: Grey Quarter Blocks

sciencebagadvanced.description: Unlocks the Advanced Science Bag, used for advanced research
sciencebagadvanced.name: Advanced Science Bag

sciencebagbasic.description: Unlocks the Basic Science Bag, used for basic research
sciencebagbasic.name: Basic Science Bag

sciencebagcolony.description: Unlocks the Colony Science Bag, used for colony related research
sciencebagcolony.name: Colony Science Bag

sciencebaglife.description: Unlocks the Life Science Bag, necessary to research health related upgrades
sciencebaglife.name: Life Science Bag

sciencebagmilitary.description: Unlocks the Military Science Bag, used for military research
sciencebagmilitary.name: Military science bag

splittingstump.description: Unlocks splitting stumps. Can be used to craft firewood more rapidly than the workbench.
splittingstump.name: Splitting Stump

stonemasonworkbench.description: Unlocks the stonemason, who can craft different varieties of bricks
stonemasonworkbench.name: Stonemason's Workbench

tailorshop.description: Unlock the tailor, who turns flax into linen
tailorshop.name: Tailor

technologisttable.description: Unlocks the technologist, who crafts Science Bags
technologisttable.name: Technologist

wheatfarming.description: A more complex method of food production, for advanced colonies only. Unlocks wheat farmers, the grindstone and the oven. Grants 400 wheat seeds.
wheatfarming.name: Bread Production

areaselection.description: Choose whether or not you want to remove the area here.

banner.description: Colonists require 5 food units per day, and a bed. Recruiting a colonist costs 50 food units.
banner.resettooltipb: This kills all your colonists and removes your job fields.
banner.resettooltipc: It also gives you a fresh new inventory and stockpile.

science.placelab: Place a Science Lab to recruit a scientist

inventory.stockpiledescription: You can only craft things with the items in the slots on the bottom. Colonists can only use items in your stockpile.

limits.description: Colonists will work until the set amount is reached in the stockpile.

hoverpriority.b:
Recipes with a +++ priority are crafted first.
Recipes with a + priority are crafted last.

quickstart.closehelp: Press F1 to close or re-open this menu

specialblockremoval.description: Removing this block of type {0} may cause problems for a colony. What do you want to do?

toolconstruction.description: Select the type of area you want to create.

tooljob.alkanetfarmertooltip:
Needs: Alkanet Seeds
Place on grass or dirt
tooljob.berrya: Quick and easy food, start with this!
tooljob.berryb:
Needs: Berry seeds
Place on grass or dirt
tooljob.bowtooltip:
Damage: 100 HP
Range: 20 blocks
Reload speed: 5 seconds
tooljob.buildera: Fill an area of the world
tooljob.builderb: Opens a menu to select the type, then select the area to fill
tooljob.construction2: This will open another menu where you can select the construction type
tooljob.constructionjobb: Place next to a construction area
tooljob.crossbowtooltip:
Damage: 300 HP
Range: 25 blocks
Reload speed: 8 seconds
tooljob.description: Select the type of area you want to create.
tooljob.diggera: Dig out an area of the world
tooljob.diggerb: Select the area to dig out
tooljob.flaxb:
Needs: Flax Seeds
Place on grass or dirt
tooljob.flaxherbfarmingb: This will open another menu where you can select the farmer types
tooljob.foresterb:
Needs: Saplings and an axe
Place on grass or dirt
tooljob.guardb: This will open another menu where you can select the guard types
tooljob.hollyhockfarmertooltip:
Needs: Hollyhock Seeds
Place on grass or dirt
tooljob.matchlocktooltip:
Damage: 500 HP
Range: 30 blocks
Reload speed: 12 seconds
tooljob.minerb:
Needs: Pickaxe
Dig down and place on top of ores or dark stone
tooljob.slingertooltip:
Damage: 50 HP
Range: 12 blocks
Reload speed: 3 seconds
tooljob.wheatb:
Needs: Wheat Seeds
Place on grass or dirt
tooljob.wolfsbanefarmertooltip:
Needs: Wolfsbane Seeds
Place on grass or dirt

page1.text1: The banner is the center of your colony. Press '2' to plant it. Right-click the banner to recruit colonists. The Banner Tool highlights the area where monsters spawn in red.
page1.text2: You need food and beds to recruit colonists. Colonists need to eat to survive. Make sure there is enough food available, or they will starve!
page1.text3: Press "I" to craft a bed. You can only craft things with the items in the slots on the bottom. Colonists can only use items in your stockpile. They access the stockpile using crates.
page1.text4: Monsters will attack your colony at night! Use the Command Tool to place guards. Press '1' and click to select it. Press 'R' to rotate certain blocks.

page2.description: You'll need food to recruit and sustain your colonists!
page2.text1: Use the Commandtool (press 1) to create a berry farmer. Right-click on a block of grass, choose the right job and create an area for the farmer. Left-click to change job type.
page2.text2: Producing bread is a complicated but efficient method of food production. Start by making a wheat farm. After two nights your wheat will be fully grown and your farmers will harvest it.
page2.text3: After that, youâ€™ll need to recruit two new people by placing a grindstone and an oven. The grindstone is used to convert the wheat into flour. A baker will use the oven to bake bread.

page3.description: Defend your colony against the monsters of the night!
page3.text1: At night, monsters will try to attack your colony. Place guards, build walls and dig moats to defend your colony. Monsters cannot climb two blocks.
page3.text2: Do not completely isolate your colony! If there is no path towards your banner, 'Siege Mode' will activate. During Siege Mode, your stored food is quickly consumed.
page3.text3: The amount of monsters increases when the amount of colonists grows! Make sure your guards have enough missiles!
page3.text4: Defeat stronger monsters by unlocking new weapons with the Science Lab. They inflict more damage and can hit monsters from a longer distance.

page4.description: Ores are a fundamental requirement for your colony.
page4.text1: Deep under the earth's crust, all kinds of ores can be found. Dig down or dig into the side of a mountain to find them.
page4.text2: Right-click ores or dark blocks of stone with the Command Tool to set miners to work. Don't forget to place a crate nearby.
page4.text3: Place a furnace to recruit an unemployed colonist as a smelter. He'll use firewood to smelt copper and tin into bronze ingots.
page4.text4: Colonists use workbenches and anvils to craft metals into useful products. Use the Science Lab to unlock the anvil.

page5.description: Only the smallest colonies can do without science!
page5.text1: Place the Science Lab to recruit a scientist. Right-click the lab or use the tab in the inventory menu to view the science menu.
page5.text2: Select research to let the scientist unlock it. He'll work a certain amount of cycles to complete the research. Every cycle consumes ingredients.
page5.text3: Higher level research requires Science Bags. Recruit a technologist to craft Science Bags. The bags themselves can be reused multiple times.
page5.text4: Scientists can work together to speed up research. Place more Science Labs to recruit extra scientists!

languagemenu.coverage: This locale is {0:F1}% complete. To help localize this, see the forums or our repository on github
languagemenu.wiptext: Work in progress. This does not cover all text in the game, and some translations may cover less than others.

typeuses.alkanet: In real life, a source of red dye
typeuses.alkanetstage1: Will be blue flower. Put it in the ground
typeuses.berrybush: Colonists can plant these for easy food
typeuses.bloomery: Uses charcoal as fuel to smelt iron and galena
typeuses.bricks: It's a Dutch game, after all
typeuses.bronzeanvil: A unique anvil in the shape of a block
typeuses.bronzearrow: Monsters keep leaving negative reviews. Guards like it though!
typeuses.bronzecoin: Not as valuable as the gold variant
typeuses.bronzepickaxe: Use the command tool to assign a miner. He'll use a pickaxe to extract infinite ores or stones from a block!
typeuses.bronzeplate: Like most foods, use it before it turns green!
typeuses.carpetblue: When people don't deserve the red-carpet treatment
typeuses.carpetred: It doesn't matter if you spill berry juice on this carpet!
typeuses.cherryblossom: The pinkest thing in the game
typeuses.cherrysapling: Cosmetic item. Pay 10 Colonycoins to unlock
typeuses.clay: I wish you could touch it
typeuses.clothing: It looks like something you can wear. You can't.
typeuses.cokes: Creating and burning this stuff is probably totally safe for your health and the environment
typeuses.copper: Does not need to be smelted. So convenient!
typeuses.coppernails: An innovative way to combine pieces of wood
typeuses.coppertools: You can't even cut bread without tools
typeuses.crystal: Produced when rich galena is smelted
typeuses.darkstone: All stone-made blocks start from here
typeuses.fineryforge: Requires cokes to create steel and gold ingots
typeuses.flour: A colonist with an oven will bake this into bread
typeuses.furnace: Uses firewood as fuel to craft bronze ingots and bricks
typeuses.goldcoin: With a portrait of the king on one side
typeuses.goldingot: Was once used to guarantee the value of paper money
typeuses.grassrainforest: This grass does seem pretty green
typeuses.grasssavanna: The grass seems greener on the other side
typeuses.grindstone: Used to grind wheat into flour
typeuses.gunpowderpouch: Can be used to fire a matchlock gun
typeuses.gypsum: Cosmetic item. Should have been a microtransaction
typeuses.hollyhock: A laxative in real life. Not in-game. Yet.
typeuses.hollyhockstage1: Will be red flower. Put it in the ground
typeuses.ironblock: Don't drop it on your foot
typeuses.ironore: Mined with an iron pickaxe that's made of iron ore
typeuses.lanternpink: Makes your crops grow well, maybe
typeuses.lanternred: These are popular in Amsterdam too
typeuses.lead: Use it in your pipes and destroy your civilization with lead poisoning
typeuses.leadbullet: Can be fired by a matchlock gun
typeuses.leavestaiga: I've got a Christmas feeling now
typeuses.leavestemperate: Try to jump into a pile of these from a high tower
typeuses.linen: Lingerie means underwear made of linen
typeuses.linenpouch: Can be used to store gunpowder
typeuses.logtemperate: Like an output log, but different
typeuses.matchlockgun: Requires gunpowder pouches to fire lead bullets
typeuses.mint: It's not counterfeiting if the king says it's okay
typeuses.oven: Uses firewood as fuel to bake flour into bread
typeuses.planks: Now with 4 times the volume of logs!
typeuses.redplanks: Does not have any food value, but it tastes pretty good
typeuses.salpeter: Don't spice up your food with this
typeuses.sand: Does not mix well with snakes
typeuses.sciencebaglife: Required to research science related to health and life
typeuses.sciencebagmilitary: Required to research science related to combat
typeuses.sciencelab: Used by a Scientist to unlock new technologies. Multiple Scientists can work together!
typeuses.splittingstump: A quicker way to split wood into firewood
typeuses.stoneblock: Can't place a miner on this
typeuses.straw: Needed for beds, byproduct of wheat farming
typeuses.tailorshop: Can make linen, carpet, clothing and bags
typeuses.water: You are NOT supposed to have this in your inventory!
typeuses.wheat: A colonist with a grindstone will turn this into flour
typeuses.wolfsbane: Prevents wolves from attacking your colony
typeuses.wolfsbanestage1: Will be yellow flower. Can farm only for a dyeing use
typeuses.workbench: Recruits an artisan. Will do the crafting for you!
